front.title: Bootstrapping RFC3118 Delayed DHCP Authentication Using EAP-based Network Access Authentication

abstract.t: The DHCP authentication extension (RFC 3118) cannot be widelydeployed due to lack of a key agreement protocol. This documentoutlines how EAP-based network access authentication mechanisms canbe used to establish bootstrap keying material that can be used tosubsequently use RFC 3118 security.
